MS.S: The xActiveDirectory module is originally part of the Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) Resource Kit. This version has been modified for use in Azure. This module contains the xADDomain, xADDomainController, xADUser, and xWaitForDomain resources. These DSC Resources allow you to configure and manage Active Directory._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All of the resources in the DSC Resource Kit are provided AS IS, and are not supported through any Microsoft standard support program or service.

- Changes to xActiveDirectory_x000D__x000A_ - Added new helper functions in xADCommon, see each functions comment-based_x000D__x000A_ help for more information._x000D__x000A_ - Convert-PropertyMapToObjectProperties_x000D__x000A_ - Compare-ResourcePropertyState_x000D__x000A_ - Test-DscPropertyState_x000D__x000A_ - Move the examples in the README.md to Examples folder._x000D__x000A_ - Fix Script Analyzer rule failures._x000D__x000A_ - Opt-in to the following DSC Resource Common Meta Tests:_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Custom Script Analyzer Rules_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Required Script Analyzer Rules_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Flagged Script Analyzer Rules_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Module Files ([issue 282](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/282))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Script Files ([issue 283](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/283))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Relative Path Length ([issue 284](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/284))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Markdown Links ([issue 280](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/280))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Localization ([issue 281](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/281))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Example Files ([issue 279](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/279))_x000D__x000A_ - Common Tests - Validate Example Files To Be Published ([issue 311](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/311))_x000D__x000A_ - Move resource descriptions to Wiki using auto-documentation ([issue 289](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/289))_x000D__x000A_ - Move helper functions from MSFT_x005F_xADCommon to the module_x000D__x000A_ xActiveDirectory.Common ([issue 288](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/288))._x000D__x000A_ - Removed helper function `Test-ADDomain` since it was not used. The_x000D__x000A_ helper function had design flaws too._x000D__x000A_ - Now the helper function `Test-Members` outputs all the members that_x000D__x000A_ are not in desired state when verbose output is enabled._x000D__x000A_ - Update all unit tests to latest unit test template._x000D__x000A_ - Deleted the obsolete xActiveDirectory_TechNetDocumentation.html file._x000D__x000A_ - Added new resource xADObjectEnabledState. This resource should be_x000D__x000A_ used to enforce the `Enabled` property of computer accounts. This_x000D__x000A_ resource replaces the deprecated `Enabled` property in the resource_x000D__x000A_ xADComputer._x000D__x000A_ - Cleanup of code_x000D__x000A_ - Removed semicolon throughout where it is not needed._x000D__x000A_ - Migrate tests to Pester syntax v4.x ([issue 322](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/322))._x000D__x000A_ - Removed `-MockWith {}` in unit tests._x000D__x000A_ - Use fully qualified type names for parameters and variables_x000D__x000A_ ([issue 374](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/374))._x000D__x000A_ - Removed unused legacy test files from the root of the repository._x000D__x000A_ - Updated Example List README with missing resources._x000D__x000A_ - Added missing examples for xADReplicationSubnet, xADServicePrincipalName and xWaitForADDomain. ([issue 395](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/395))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADComputer_x000D__x000A_ - Refactored the resource and the unit tests._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The `Enabled` property is **DEPRECATED** and is no_x000D__x000A_ longer set or enforces with this resource. _If this parameter is__x000D__x000A_ _used in a configuration a warning message will be outputted saying__x000D__x000A_ _that the `Enabled` parameter has been deprecated_. The new resource_x000D__x000A_ [xADObjectEnabledState](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectoryxadobjectenabledstate)_x000D__x000A_ can be used to enforce the `Enabled` property._x000D__x000A_ - BREAKING CHANGE: The default value of the enabled property of the_x000D__x000A_ computer account will be set to the default value of the cmdlet_x000D__x000A_ `New-ADComputer`._x000D__x000A_ - A new parameter was added called `EnabledOnCreation` that will control_x000D__x000A_ if the computer account is created enabled or disabled._x000D__x000A_ - Moved examples from the README.md to separate example files in the_x000D__x000A_ Examples folder._x000D__x000A_ - Fix the RestoreFromRecycleBin description._x000D__x000A_ - Fix unnecessary cast in `Test-TargetResource` ([issue 295](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/295))._x000D__x000A_ - Fix ServicePrincipalNames property empty string exception ([issue 382](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/382))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADGroup_x000D__x000A_ - Change the description of the property RestoreFromRecycleBin._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADObjectPermissionEntry_x000D__x000A_ - Change the description of the property IdentityReference._x000D__x000A_ - Fix failure when applied in the same configuration as xADDomain._x000D__x000A_ - Localize and Improve verbose messaging._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADOrganizationalUnit_x000D__x000A_ - Change the description of the property RestoreFromRecycleBin._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_ - Fix incorrect verbose message when this resource has Ensure set to Absent ([issue 276](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/276))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADUser_x000D__x000A_ - Change the description of the property RestoreFromRecycleBin._x000D__x000A_ - Added ServicePrincipalNames property ([issue 153](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/153))._x000D__x000A_ - Added ChangePasswordAtLogon property ([issue 246](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/246))._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_ - Added LogonWorkstations property_x000D__x000A_ - Added Organization property_x000D__x000A_ - Added OtherName property_x000D__x000A_ - Added AccountNotDelegated property_x000D__x000A_ - Added AllowReversiblePasswordEncryption property_x000D__x000A_ - Added CompoundIdentitySupported property_x000D__x000A_ - Added PasswordNotRequired property_x000D__x000A_ - Added SmartcardLogonRequired property_x000D__x000A_ - Added ProxyAddresses property ([Issue 254](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/254))._x000D__x000A_ - Fix Password property being updated whenever another property is changed_x000D__x000A_ ([issue 384](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/384))._x000D__x000A_ - Replace Write-Error with the correct helper function ([Issue 331](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/331))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADDomainController_x000D__x000A_ - Change the `Requires` statement in the Examples to require the correct_x000D__x000A_ module._x000D__x000A_ - Suppressing the Script Analyzer rule `PSAvoidGlobalVars` since the_x000D__x000A_ resource is using the `$global:DSCMachineStatus` variable to trigger_x000D__x000A_ a reboot._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADDomain_x000D__x000A_ - Suppressing the Script Analyzer rule `PSAvoidGlobalVars` since the_x000D__x000A_ resource is using the `$global:DSCMachineStatus` variable to trigger_x000D__x000A_ a reboot._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADDomainTrust_x000D__x000A_ - Replaced New-TerminatingError with Standard Function._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xWaitForADDomain_x000D__x000A_ - Suppressing the Script Analyzer rule `PSAvoidGlobalVars` since the_x000D__x000A_ resource is using the `$global:DSCMachineStatus` variable to trigger_x000D__x000A_ a reboot._x000D__x000A_ - Added missing property schema descriptions ([issue 369](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/369))._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADRecycleBin_x000D__x000A_ - Remove unneeded example and resource designer files._x000D__x000A_ - Added missing property schema descriptions ([issue 368](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/368))._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_ - It now sets back the `$ErrorActionPreference` that was set prior to_x000D__x000A_ setting it to `"Stop"`._x000D__x000A_ - Replace Write-Error with the correct helper function ([issue 327](https://github.com/PowerShell/xActiveDirectory/issues/327))._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADReplicationSiteLink_x000D__x000A_ - Fix ADIdentityNotFoundException when creating a new site link._x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADReplicationSubnet_x000D__x000A_ - Remove `{ *Present* | Absent }` from the property schema descriptions_x000D__x000A_ which were causing corruption in the Wiki documentation._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADServicePrincipalNames_x000D__x000A_ - Remove `{ *Present* | Absent }` from the property schema descriptions_x000D__x000A_ which were causing corruption in the Wiki documentation._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADDomainDefaultPasswordPolicy_x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADForestProperties_x000D__x000A_ - Minor style cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADReplicationSubnet_x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADKDSKey_x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADManagedServiceAccount_x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup._x000D__x000A_- Changes to xADServicePrincipalName_x000D__x000A_ - Code cleanup.

The xActiveDirectory module is originally part of the Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) Resource Kit. This version has been modified for use in Azure. This module contains the xADDomain, xADDomainController, xADUser, and xWaitForDomain resources. These DSC Resources allow you to configure and manage Active Directory._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_All of the resources in the DSC Resource Kit are provided AS IS, and are not supported through any Microsoft standard support program or service.
